attributes.action: The true number of N.I. Registrations issued to E.U. Nationals must be disclosed
attributes.additional_details: ? Why NI registrations since year ending December 2009 rising greater than the rate of immigration.Need a NI number to legally work and claim benefits in the UK.
attributes.background: Department for Work & Pensions statistics show 917,000 NINo registrations to year June 2015. An increase of 352,000 (62%) on the previous year, 76% from within EU.Figures totally at odds with official figures for net migration to UK !.How to explain the very large discrepancy,or 'cover up' ?.
